title: Strategic Build Planner QA Rubric

dimensions.name: Completeness
dimensions.description: All APQP sections populated with project-specific detail; no placeholders or UNKNOWN values.

dimensions.name: Specificity
dimensions.description: Quantitative tolerances, materials, takt targets, and owners are explicit.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.description: Next steps include owners, due dates, and clear deliverables; open questions have assigned follow-up.

dimensions.name: Manufacturability
dimensions.description: Process flow, tooling, and quality plans align with stainless sheet-metal fabrication reality.

dimensions.name: Risk & Mitigation
dimensions.description: Critical risks have quantified impact and mitigations tied to accountable owners.

scoring_notes: Scores below 60 indicate the plan is not ready for customer review.
Any UNKNOWN field should trigger at least one fix recommendation.
Missing risk mitigations or timelines cap the score at 75.
